mapper.select: SELECT book_id, book_title, book_cover, author, book_price, publisher, pubdate, description FROM book ORDER BY pubdate DESC, book_id DESC FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT b.book_id, b.book_title, b.book_cover, b.author, b.book_price, b.publisher, b.pubdate, b.description FROM book b ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT DISTINCT b.book_id, b.book_title, b.book_cover, b.author, b.book_price, b.publisher, b.pubdate, b.description FROM book b JOIN event e ON e.book_id = b.book_id FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY
